qbraid.devices.aws.BraketDeviceWrapper¶

class BraketDeviceWrapper(name, provider, **fields)[source]¶

Wrapper class for Amazon Braket Device objects.

Create a BraketDeviceWrapper

Parameters

  • name (str) – a Braket supported device

  • provider (str) – the provider that this device comes from

  • fields – Any kwarg options to pass to the backend for running the config. If a key is also present in the options attribute/object then the expectation is that the value specified will be used instead of what’s set in the options object.

Raises

DeviceError – if input field not a valid options

__init__(name, provider, **fields)[source]¶

Create a BraketDeviceWrapper

Parameters

  • name (str) – a Braket supported device

  • provider (str) – the provider that this device comes from

  • fields – Any kwarg options to pass to the backend for running the config. If a key is also present in the options attribute/object then the expectation is that the value specified will be used instead of what’s set in the options object.

Raises

DeviceError – if input field not a valid options

Methods

__init__(name, provider, **fields)

Create a BraketDeviceWrapper

device_configuration()

Return the device configuration.

get_sampler([braket_default, embedding])

Returns BraketSampler created from device.

run(run_input, *args, **kwargs)

Run a quantum task specification on this quantum device.

set_options(**fields)

Set the options fields for the device.

Attributes

name

Return the device name.

options

Return the options for the device.

provider

Return the device provider.

vendor

Return the software vendor name.
